Class LeaderShelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resources.Shelf
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resources.LeaderShelf
public class LeaderShelf
extends Shelf
this class represent the shelf of a leader card when activated

  • Constructor Summary

    LeaderShelf​(ResourceType type)

      public boolean addResource​(Resource toAdd)
      this method add a resource if this is of the type of the leaderShelf and if there is space in the shelf
      Overrides:
      addResource in class Shelf
      Parameters:
      toAdd - resource
      Returns:
